opponentSing: <<OPPONENT>> sings so loud, they drown you out!
boyfriendMiss: You tried to freestyle so hard, you missed!

five:
You sing loudly! You drown out
your opponent.

You sing outstandingly! <<OPPONENT>> gets blown
  away!
ten:
You sing proudly! Your microphone seems a little
  scuffed, but that won't stop you!

You sing happily! You try to freestyle, but it's a
  little bit hard to do that in such a heated battle.
